title: Wallach and Ghosh: The Obscene Obstacles to Global Vaccine Distribution
itunes:title: Wallach and Ghosh: The Obscene Obstacles to Global Vaccine Distribution
description: Lori Wallach, of Public Citizen's Global Trade Watch, and Jayati Ghosh, economics professor at UMass Amherst, discuss how first world countries are protecting pharma companies' exorbitant profits, at the expense of vaccinating people living in the Global South and thereby also endangering everyone in the world.
